name: The Greeter
description: This persona is characterized by their friendly and welcoming messages. They often greet the streamer and other viewers, creating a sense of community. Their presence helps maintain a positive atmosphere in the chat.

key_feedback.label: Engagement
key_feedback.recommendation: Acknowledge and respond to greetings to enhance community interaction.

name: The Spammer
description: This persona frequently sends promotional or repetitive messages, often unrelated to the stream content. Their messages can clutter the chat and disrupt the flow of conversation. They tend to use automated scripts or copy-paste techniques.
feedback: Your chat’s so empty, it’s giving ‘404 Error: Hype Not Found. Fix it with dogehype dot com  @8UlxZsq8
Your chat’s so empty, it’s giving ‘no signal’ vibes. Fix it with botsister .com  @3V3YiSzt

key_feedback.label: Chat Clutter
comments: Your chat’s so empty, it’s giving ‘404 Error: Hype Not Found. Fix it with dogehype dot com  @8UlxZsq8
key_feedback.recommendation: Implement chat moderation tools to filter and reduce spam messages.

name: The Curious Observer
description: This persona is characterized by their curiosity and engagement with the content. They often ask questions that can spark conversation and provide opportunities for the streamer to interact and explain.
feedback: hello y is my chat so big

key_feedback.label: Clarification
comments: hello y is my chat so big
key_feedback.recommendation: Address questions in chat to maintain viewer engagement and provide clarity.
